channel.title: Distributedobservers on Le's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Distributedobservers on Le's Blog

item.title: Design of the distributed observers
item.description: Consider the distributed observer design problem for nonlinear systems. The framework can be represented as below. Problem formulate The plant system is modelled as $$ \dot{X}=AX+F(t,X) $$ where $ X=(x_1,x_2,\ldots,x_n)^T \in R^n $, matrix $A {\in R^{n\times n}}$ and nonlinear term $F(t,X):[0, T)\times R^n\rightarrow R^n$ have the following form $$A=\begin{pmatrix} 0 & \delta_{1} & \cdots & 0 \\ \vdots & \vdots & & \vdots \\ 0 & 0 & \cdots & \delta_{n-1} \\
